'''"Allogravity-Condensed Water Body" affected by energy flow'''<!-- in-game name has "affected by energy flow" lowercase --> is a quest-exclusive [[climate]] that affects [[Allogravity-Condensed Water Body|Allogravity-Condensed Water Bodies]] during {{Quest|Fontaine Research Institute, Stagnating in the Rubble}}.

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial|Transformed "Allogravity-Condensed Water Body"}}

==Description==
{{Description|'''"Allogravity-Condensed Water Body" affected by energy flow'''
* After the Central Laboratory exploded for a second time, the condensors fell into certain "Allogravity-Condensed Water Bodies," and the energy flows emitted by the condensers transformed the "Allogravity-Condensed Water Bodies." If you stay in that kind of "Allogravity-Condensed Water Body" for too long, the effects will be inestimable.}}
